mapper.sql: ID, USERCODE, USERNAME, MOBILE, PHOTO, LOGINNAME, LOGINPWD, ROLETYPE, SEX, EMAIL, CARDNUMBER, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, NICKNAME, FRIENDSCIRCLE, HTTPPHOTO, HTTPFRIEND, PAYPASSWORD
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO (ID, USERCODE, USERNAME, MOBILE, PHOTO, LOGINNAME, LOGINPWD, ROLETYPE, SEX, EMAIL, CARDNUMBER, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, NICKNAME, FRIENDSCIRCLE, HTTPPHOTO, HTTPFRIEND, PAYPASSWORD) values (SEQ_ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO.Nextval, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdonutc,jdbcType=DATE}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedonutc,jdbcType=DATE}, #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{friendscircle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{httpphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{httpfriend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
USERCODE,
USERNAME,
MOBILE,
PHOTO,
LOGINNAME,

EMAIL,

UPDATEDONUTC,

HTTPPHOTO,
HTTPFRIEND,
PAYPASSWORD,
SEQ_ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO.Nextval,

#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO
USERCODE = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHOTO = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGINNAME = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGINPWD = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLETYPE = #{roletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRIENDSCIRCLE = #{friendscircle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTTPPHOTO = #{httpphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTTPFRIEND = #{httpfriend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYPASSWORD = #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO set USERCODE = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINNAME = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINPWD = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLETYPE = #{roletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRIENDSCIRCLE = #{friendscircle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTTPPHOTO = #{httpphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTTPFRIEND = #{httpfriend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYPASSWORD = #{paypassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT b.USERNAME, b.MOBILE FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT t LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER a ON t.MERCHANTCODE = a.FARMMACHINEYCODE LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO b ON a.USERCODE = b.USERCODE WHERE t.MERCHANTCODE=#{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (a.ROLETYPE='2' OR a.ROLETYPE='5')

SELECT b.USERNAME, b.MOBILE FROM ZLNF_COOPINFO t LEFT JOIN ZLNF_COOPUSER a ON t.COOPCODE = a.COOPCODE LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO b ON a.USERCODE = b.USERCODE WHERE t.COOPCODE=#{coopcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (a.ROLETYPE='1' OR a.ROLETYPE='2' OR a.ROLETYPE='3')
